title: Herbed Garlic Bread
ingredients: ½ cup	butter or margarine, softened
instructions: Place the butter in small mixing bowl and allow it to soften at room temperature.  Once it softens cream the butter using a blender.  Add the all the ingredients and mix the mixture well and set aside.

Slice the bread, but not all the way through, leaving the slices attached at the bottom.  Spread the mixture between the slices.  Wrap the loaf of French bread in a large slice of heavy duty foil.  Place the wrapped loaf on a cookie sheet and bake for 15 to 20 minutes; or, until the bread is heated through.
Source:  Country, A Taste of Country, recipe submitted by Wendy Smith, Hartford, Wisconsin, Aug/Sept, 2003.
